name: A Rom Of Frogs & Rum
description:
87% of pirates love to get drunk, according to the latest studies. The remaining 13% were so wasted they couldn't answer.

Frog pirates follow the same set of rules as other pirates, only they jump better.
You're the captain of a magnificent boat and have to keep your damned sailors away from your barrels of rum ! They're so stupid that when they drink from the barrels they keep them open and it floods the whole hold !
Experiment the simple joy of throwing away frog pirates from a ship full of booze and bugs.
